body: Atsutaka losing his job is pretty scary but hopefully that tan kid fucks off. I cant read japanese but looking through the raws it seemed mitsuru was disgusted with him and kept thinking about atsutaka
JUST SAY YOU LOVE EACH OTHER ALREADY GODDAMMIT! >.<
Thanks dude. That's a weight off my back.
The tanned dude tried to hit on Mitsuru but got rejected. So no NTR as of CHP 21 but Atsutaka lost his job so who knows what will happen next lol
I was talking about the tanned guy that appeared in the last chapters of the japanese version

If you're talking about the sleepy looking dude it's MC's work buddy, I don't think he seems like much of a threat at the moment. The only thing he might steal would be their food. If you mean the guy with glasses it's just MC in disguise.

Would someone that can read the lastest released japanese chapters kindly explain who the fuck is the NTR looking asshole that has appeared in the last chapters, and how worried about him I should be?
There is no way that i could die before see this couple getting married i can feel the love and the sweet feelings between they i love it even with less sex this would be a top tier romantic story.
Best releasing series without a doubt

This is a close representation of how i could describe paradise , almost everything is perfect the draw quality, the details on the clothing and the faces and their feelings not completely assumed but with a bit of romance, the humour and kawaii stuf
even with less sex it's a very enjoyable serie
